sentences.sentence: An appeaser is one who feeds a crocodile, hoping it will eat him last.
sentences.translation: 求和者就是希望鳄鱼最后一个吃自己的人。

sentences.sentence: An appeaser is one who feeds a crocodile — hoping it will eat him last.
sentences.translation: 绥靖者是纵恶的喂鳄鱼的人——希望鳄鱼最后一个吃他。

sentences.sentence: Still, we promise we'll make an appearance. The appearance is an appeaser.
sentences.translation: 我们仍然答应会出现，因为这样做皆大欢喜。
